Bernie Sanders has taken corporate lobbyist money — in small amounts

    If Your Time is short

   Bernie Sanders is fond of calling his presidential campaign a grass-roots
   movement that rejects money from big-business interests.

Our ruling

   Ocasio-Cortez said Sanders has "never taken corporate lobbyist money in
